sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react"; import MainDashboardTop from "pages/Login/MainDashboardTop"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import EmailCard from "pages/Login/EmailCard"; import NewFooter from "pages/Login/Footer"; import RoomBox from "./HostelRooms"; function HostelPages() { const [currentView, setCurrentView] = useState("Overview"); const handleButtonClick = (view) => { setCurrentView(view); setActiveButton(view); // Update active button when clicked }; const navigate = useNavigate(); const handleHostelPagesClick = () => { // Navigate to the new page when the button is clicked navigate("/HostelPages"); }; const [activeButton, setActiveButton] = useState("Overview"); // State to track active button const [showRoomBoxes, setShowRoomBoxes] = useState(false); const handlesButtonClick = (buttonName) => { setActiveButton(buttonName); if (buttonName === "Detached") { setShowRoomBoxes(true);
